title: Tropical Temptation Beach Club Afternoon (Half-day)
overview: Chic beach club offering sunset cocktails, daybeds, and ocean views at Pecatu.

stops.description: Depart for Tropical Temptation Beach Club.
Arrive and relax on daybeds, enjoy cocktails, and ocean views.
Experience the sunset from the club's terrace.

title: Tropical Temptation Beach Club Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of relaxation, cocktails, and ocean views at Tropical Temptation Beach Club.

stops.description: Depart for Tropical Temptation Beach Club.
Arrive and enjoy daybeds, ocean views, and cocktails.
Lunch with a view of the ocean.
Relax by the pool or enjoy club activities.
Experience the sunset from the club's terrace.
